content.text:
# Culex wardi

Culex (Lophoceraomyia) wardi is a species of mosquito belonging to the genus Culex. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.
References
External links
*[https://www.cabdirect.org/cabdirect/abstract/19651000268 Culex sinensis Theo. a possible vector of Wuchereria bancrofti in Calcutta.]
